subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Box12 audio malfunction.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Not quite a malfunction, the AM side is putting out about twice the signal 
as the FM, so on loud stations there's enough audio out of the monitor 
speaker to cause feedback. I put an attenuator on the output of the AM 
tuner, which helps.

It's the type of voices that gets to me sometimes, how many times to I have 
listen to crackhead aliens saying they're coming to pick up their Purple 
Princess!?  I think the purpose of EVP is make us nutz! Or maybe I need some 
of Art Bell's Gray Away Spray!?

Frank-S
